description.english: You have completed the tutorial, welcome on board, Operator
description.german: Du hast das Tutorial abgeschlossen, willkommen Pilot
description.french: Vous avez terminé le tutoriel, bienvenue Opérateur
description.spanish: Has completado el tutorial, bienvenido Operador
description.italian: Tutorial

description.english: You have completed the Prelude: Prototype
description.german: Du hast den Auftakt: Prototyp abgeschlossen
description.spanish: Has completado el Preludio: Prototipo
description.french: Vous avez terminé Prélude: Prototype
description.italian: Hai completato il Preludio: Prototipo

description.english: You have completed the Style Stadium
description.german: Du hast das Stil-Stadium abgeschlossen
description.spanish: Has completado el Estadio Estilo
description.french: Vous avez terminé Style Stade
description.italian: Hai completato lo Stadio Stile

description.english: You have completed the Cactus Canyon
description.german: Du hast die Stachel-Schlucht abgeschlossen
description.spanish: Has completado el Cañón Cactus
description.french: Vous avez terminé Canyon Cactus
description.italian: Hai completato il CanYon Cactus

description.english: You have completed the Bridge Bay
description.german: Du hast die Brücken-Bucht abgeschlossen
description.spanish: Has completado la Bahía Viaducto
description.french: Vous avez terminé Bay Bridge
description.italian: Hai completato la Baia Viadotto

description.english: You have completed the Caprice Cruise
description.german: Du hast die Kaprizen-Kreuzfahrt abgeschlossen
description.spanish: Has completado el Crucero Capricho
description.french: Vous avez terminé Croisière Caprice
description.italian: Hai completato la Crociera Capriccio

description.english: You have completed the At Sign Archive
description.german: Du hast das Attribut-Archiv abgeschlossen
description.spanish: Has completado el Archivo Arroba
description.french: Vous avez terminé Archive Arobase
description.italian: Hai completato l'Archivio Chiocciola

description.english: You have completed the Consignment Capital
description.german: Du hast das Komissionierungs-Kapitol abgeschlossen
description.spanish: Has completado la Capital Consigna
description.french: Vous avez terminé Capital Consignation
description.italian: Hai completato la Capitale Consegna

description.english: You have completed the Volcano Village
description.german: Du hast die Vulkan-Villen abgeschlossen
description.spanish: Has completado el Villa Volcán
description.french: Vous avez terminé Villa Volcan
description.italian: Hai completato Villaggio Vulcano

description.english: You have achieved 10 different Bronze medals. Good job, Operator
description.german: Du hast 10 verschiedene Bronze-Medaillen verdient. Gute Arbeit, Pilot
description.spanish: Has conseguido 10 medallas de Bronce diferentes. Buen trabajo, Operador
description.french: Vous avez gagné 10 médailles de bronze différentes. Bon travail, Opérateur !
description.italian: Hai vinto 10 medaglie di Bronzo diverse. Buon lavoro, Operatore!

description.english: You have completed the Fragmented Front
description.german: Du hast die Fragmentierte Front abgeschlossen
description.spanish: Has completado el Frente Fragmentado
description.french: Vous avez terminé Front Fragmenté
description.italian: Hai completato Il Fronte Frammentato

description.english: You have successfully defeated the Iron Incursor
description.german: Du hast den Panzer Prügeler erfolgreich besiegt
description.spanish: Has conseguido derrotar al Asaltante Acorazado
description.french: Vous avez réussi à vaincre l'Assaillant Armé
description.italian: Sei riuscito a sconfiggere l'Assalto Corazzato

description.english: You have successfully defeated the Wrothful Weaver
description.german: Du hast den Widerlichen Weber erfolgreich besiegt
description.spanish: Has conseguido derrotar a la Tejedora Terrible
description.french: Vous avez réussi à vaincre la Terrible Tisserande
description.italian: Sei riuscito a sconfiggere la Tessitrice Rabbiosa

description.english: You have successfully defeated the Dauntless Devourer
description.german: Du hast den Verrückten Vielfraß erfolgreich besiegt
description.spanish: Has conseguido derrotar a la Devoradora Desatada
description.french: Vous avez réussi à vaincre la Dévoreuse Déchaînée
description.italian: Sei riuscito a sconfiggere la Divoratrice Indomabile

description.english: You have successfully defeated the Titanic Trojan
description.german: Du hast den Troianischen Titan erfolgreich besiegt
description.spanish: Has conseguido derrotar al Troyano Titánico
description.french: Vous avez réussi à vaincre le Troyen Titanesque
description.italian: Sei riuscito a sconfiggere il Trojan Titanico

description.english: You have earned 7 different Silver medals - great job, Operator!
description.german: Du hast dir 7 verschiedene Silbermedaillen verdient. Toll gemacht, Pilot!
description.spanish: Has conseguido 7 medallas de Plata diferentes. ¡Gran trabajo, Operador!
description.french: Vous avez gagné  7 médailles d'argent différentes. Excellent travail, Opérateur !
description.italian: Hai vinto 7 medaglie di Argento diverse. Buon lavoro, Operatore!

description.english: For knocking down all the developers during the credits, except Jorge Chueca. He loves you too
description.german: Dafür, dass du während des Abspanns alle Entwickler, außer Jorge Chueca, ausgeschaltet hast. Er liebt dich auch
description.french: Pour avoir vaincu tous les développeurs de jeux vidéo pendant le générique, à l'exception de Jorge Chueca. Il vous aime aussi
description.italian: Per abbattere tutti gli sviluppatori durante i crediti, tranne Jorge Chueca. Lui ti vuole bene
description.spanish: Por derribar a todos los desarrolladores durante los créditos, menos a Jorge Chueca. Él también te quiere

description.english: You managed to hit all opponents with a laser shot during a race. Good eye, Operator
description.german: Du hast es geschafft, während eines Rennens alle Gegner mit einem Laserschuss zu treffen. Gutes Auge, Pilot
description.french: Vous avez réussi à atteindre tous vos adversaires avec un tir laser pendant une course. Bien vu, Opérateur
description.italian: Sei riuscito a raggiungere con uno sparo tutti gli avversari durante una carriera. Buona vista, Operatore!
description.spanish: Has conseguir alcanzar con un disparo láser a todos los oponentes durante una carrera. Buen ojo, Operador

description.english: You have managed to defeat the last Ultra Virus, the V-Holder
description.german: Du hast den letzten Ultra-Virus, den V-Holder, erfolgreich besiegt
description.spanish: Has conseguido derrotar al último Ultra Virus, el V-Holder
description.french: Vous avez réussi à vaincre le dernier Ultra Virus, le V-Holder
description.italian: Sei riuscito a sconfiggere l'ultimo Ultra Virus, il V-Holder

description.english: You have earned 5 different Gold medals - amazing!
description.german: Du hast 5 verschiedene Goldmedaillen verdient. Erstaunlich!
description.spanish: Has conseguido 5 medallas de Oro diferentes. ¡Increíble!
description.french: Vous avez gagné  5 médailles d'or différentes. Incroyable!
description.italian: Hai vinto 5 medaglie d'Oro diverse. Incredibile!

description.english: For defeating the Iron Incursor without being hit even once
description.german: Für das Besiegen des Panzer Prügelers, ohne einmal getroffen zu werden
description.spanish: Por derrotar al Asaltante Acorazado sin que este te llegue a alcanzar ni una sola vez
description.french: Pour avoir vaincu l'Assaillant Armé sans qu'il ne vous atteigne jamais
description.italian: Per sconfiggere l'Assaltatore Corazzato senza che esso ti abbia raggiunto neanche una volta

description.english: For defeating the Wrothful Weaver without being hit even once
description.german: Für das Besiegen des Widerlichen Webers, ohne einmal getroffen zu werden
description.spanish: Por derrotar a la Tejedora Terrible sin que esta te llegue a alcanzar ni una sola vez
description.french: Pour avoir vaincu la Terrible Tisserande sans qu'elle ne vous atteigne jamais
description.italian: Per sconfiggere la Tessitrice Rabbiosa senza che essa ti abbia raggiunto neanche una volta

description.english: For defeating the Dauntless Devourer without being hit even once
description.german: Für das Besiegen des Verrückten Vielfraßes, ohne einmal getroffen zu werden
description.spanish: Por derrotar a la Devoradora Desatada sin que esta te llegue a alcanzar ni una sola vez
description.french: Pour avoir vaincu la Dévoreuse Déchaînée sans qu'elle ne vous atteigne jamais
description.italian: Per sconfiggere la Divoratrice Indomabile senza che essa ti abbia raggiunto neanche una volta

description.english: For defeating the Titanic Trojan without being hit even once
description.german: Für das Besiegen des Troianischen Titans, ohne einmal getroffen zu werden
description.spanish: Por derrotar al Troyano Titánico sin que este te llegue a alcanzar ni una sola vez
description.french: Pour avoir vaincu le Troyen Titanesque sans qu'il ne vous atteigne jamais
description.italian: Per socnfiggere il Trojan Titanico senza che esso ti abbia raggiunto neanche una volta

description.english: For defeating the V-Holder without being hit even once
description.german: Für das Besiegen des V-Holders, ohne einmal getroffen zu werden
description.spanish: Por derrotar al V-Holder sin que este te llegue a alcanzar ni una sola vez
description.french: Pour avoir vaincu V-Holder sans qu'il ne vous atteigne jamais
description.italian: Per sconfiggere  V-Holder senza che esso ti abbia raggiunto neanche una volta
